00079     #define THROW( message )                                                                                    \
00080         std::stringstream hopefullyThisNameWontConflictWithOtherVariables;                                      \
00081         std::string file( __FILE__ );                                                                           \
00082         file = file.substr( file.find_last_of( "\\/" ) + 1 );                                                   \
00083         hopefullyThisNameWontConflictWithOtherVariables << message << " <" << file << "@" << __LINE__ << ">";   \
00084         throw Exception( hopefullyThisNameWontConflictWithOtherVariables.str() );

00087     class Base
00088     {
00089     public:
00090 
00096         template < class T >
00097             std::string ToString( const T& value )
00098         {
00099             std::stringstream convert;
00100             convert << value;
00101             if ( convert.fail() )
00102             {
00103                 THROW( "Could not convert value to text" );
00104             }
00105             return convert.str();
00106         }
00107 
00108         std::string ToString( const std::string& value )
00109         {
00110             return value;
00111         }
00112 
00119         template < class T >
00120             void FromString( const std::string& temp, T* out )
00121         {
00122             std::istringstream val( temp );
00123             val >> *out;
00124 
00125             if ( val.fail() )
00126             {
00127                 THROW( "Could not convert \"" << temp << "\" to target type" );
00128             }
00129         }
00130 
00134         void FromString( const std::string& temp, std::string* out )
00135         {
00136             *out = temp;
00137         }
00138 
00143         int Row()
00144         {
00145             return GetBasePointer()->Row();
00146         }
00147 
00152         int Column()
00153         {
00154             return GetBasePointer()->Column();
00155         }
00156 
00160         virtual ~Base()
00161         {
00162             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
00163         }
00164 
00165     protected:
00166         TiCppRCImp* m_impRC;    
00168         std::vector< Base* > m_spawnedWrappers; 
00176         void SetImpRC( TiXmlBase* node )
00177         {
00178             m_impRC = node->m_tiRC;
00179         }
00180 
00181         void ValidatePointer()
00182         {
00183             if ( m_impRC->IsNull() )
00184             {
00185                 THROW( "Internal TiXml Pointer is NULL" );
00186             }
00187         }
00188 
00193         void DeleteSpawnedWrappers()
00194         {
00195             std::vector< Base* >::reverse_iterator wrapper;
00196             for ( wrapper = m_spawnedWrappers.rbegin(); wrapper != m_spawnedWrappers.rend(); ++wrapper )
00197             {
00198                 delete *wrapper;
00199             }
00200             m_spawnedWrappers.clear();
00201         }
00202 
00207         virtual TiXmlBase* GetBasePointer() = 0;
00208     };

00671         template < class T >
00672             void IterateNext( const std::string& value, T** next )
00673         {
00674             Node* sibling = NextSibling( value, false );
00675             *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00676 
00677             while ( ( NULL != sibling ) && ( NULL == *next ) )
00678             {
00679                 sibling = sibling->NextSibling( value, false );
00680                 *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00681             }
00682         }
00683 
00691         template < class T >
00692             void IteratePrevious( const std::string& value, T** previous  )
00693         {
00694             Node* sibling = PreviousSibling( value, false );
00695             *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00696 
00697             while ( ( NULL != sibling ) && ( NULL == *previous ) )
00698             {
00699                 sibling = sibling->PreviousSibling( value, false );
00700                 *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00701             }
00702         }

00797         template < class T >
00798             T* To()
00799         {
00800             T* pointer = dynamic_cast< T* >( this );
00801             if ( NULL == pointer )
00802             {
00803                 std::string thisType = typeid( this ).name();
00804                 std::string targetType = typeid( T ).name();
00805                 std::string thatType = typeid( *this ).name();
00806                 THROW( "The " << thisType.substr( 6 ) << " could not be casted to a " << targetType.substr( 6 )
00807                     << " *, because the target object is not a " << targetType.substr( 6 ) << ". (It is a " << thatType.substr( 6 ) << ")" );
00808             }
00809             return pointer;
00810         }
00811

00888     template < class T = Node >
00889         class Iterator
00890     {
00891     private:
00892         T* m_p;                 
00893         std::string m_value;    
00895     public:
00896 
00900         T* end()
00901         {
00902             return NULL;
00903         }
00904 
00906         Iterator( const std::string& value = "" )
00907             : m_p( NULL ), m_value( value )
00908         {
00909         }
00910 
00912         Iterator( T* node, const std::string& value = "" )
00913             : m_p( node ), m_value( value )
00914         {
00915         }
00916 
00918         Iterator( const Iterator& it, const std::string& value  = "" )
00919             : m_p( it.m_p ), m_value( value )
00920         {
00921         }
00922 
00927         T* Get()
00928         {
00929             return m_p;
00930         }
00931 
00933         Iterator& operator=( const Iterator& it )
00934         {
00935             m_p = it.m_p;
00936             return *this;
00937         }
00938 
00940         Iterator& operator=( T* p )
00941         {
00942             m_p = p;
00943             return *this;
00944         }
00945 
00947         Iterator& operator++()
00948         {
00949             m_p->IterateNext( m_value, &m_p );
00950             return *this;
00951         }
00952 
00954         Iterator& operator++(int)
00955         {
00956             return this->operator ++();
00957         }
00958 
00960         Iterator& operator--()
00961         {
00962             m_p->IteratePrevious( m_value, &m_p );
00963             return *this;
00964         }
00965 
00967         Iterator& operator--(int)
00968         {
00969             return this->operator --();
00970         }
00971 
00973         bool operator!=( T* p )
00974         {
00975             return m_p != p;
00976         }
00977 
00979         bool operator!=( const Iterator& it )
00980         {
00981             return m_p != it.m_p;
00982         }
00983 
00985         bool operator==( T* p )
00986         {
00987             return m_p == p;
00988         }
00989 
00991         bool operator==( const Iterator& it )
00992         {
00993             return m_p == it.m_p;
00994         }
00995 
00997         T* operator->()
00998         {
00999             return m_p;
01000         }
01001 
01003         T& operator*()
01004         {
01005             return *m_p;
01006         }
01007     };
01008 
01010     template < class T >
01011         class NodeImp : public Node
01012     {
01013     protected:
01014 
01015         T* m_tiXmlPointer;      
01023         TiXmlNode* GetTiXmlPointer()
01024         {
01025             ValidatePointer();
01026             return m_tiXmlPointer;
01027         }
01028 
01036         void SetTiXmlPointer( T* newPointer )
01037         {
01038             m_tiXmlPointer = newPointer;
01039             SetImpRC( newPointer );
01040         }
01041 
01046         NodeImp( T* tiXmlPointer )
01047         {
01048             // Check for NULL pointers
01049             if ( NULL == tiXmlPointer )
01050             {
01051                 THROW( "Can not create a " << typeid( T ).name() );
01052             }
01053             SetTiXmlPointer( tiXmlPointer );
01054             m_impRC->IncRef();
01055         }
01056 
01062         virtual void operator=( const NodeImp<T>& copy )
01063         {
01064             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
01065 
01066             // Dropping the reference to the old object
01067             this->m_impRC->DecRef();
01068 
01069             // Pointing to the new Object
01070             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01071 
01072             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01073             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01074         }
01075 
01081         NodeImp( const NodeImp<T>& copy ) : Node()
01082         {
01083             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
01084 
01085             // Dropping the reference to the old object
01086             this->m_impRC->DecRef();
01087 
01088             // Pointing to the new Object
01089             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01090 
01091             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01092             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01093         }
01094 
01095     public:
01096 
01097         /*
01098         Deletes the spawned wrapper objects.
01099         Decrements reference count.
01100         */
01101         virtual ~NodeImp()
01102         {
01103             // The spawnedWrappers need to be deleted before m_tiXmlPointer
01104             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
01105             m_impRC->DecRef();
01106         }
01107     };

01281         template < class T >
01282             void SetAttribute ( const std::string& name, const T& value )
01283         {
01284             ValidatePointer();
01285             m_tiXmlPointer->SetAttribute( name, ToString( value ) );
01286         }
01287 
01300         std::string GetText( bool throwIfNotFound = true )
01301         {
01302             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01303             std::string temp;
01304             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01305             {
01306                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01307                 {
01308                     THROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01309                 }
01310             }
01311 
01312             return temp;
01313         }
01314 
01326         std::string GetTextOrDefault( const std::string& defaultValue )
01327         {
01328             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01329             std::string temp;
01330             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01331             {
01332                 return defaultValue;
01333             }
01334 
01335             return temp;
01336         }
01337 
01352         template < class T, class DefaultT >
01353             void GetTextOrDefault( T* value, const DefaultT& defaultValue )
01354         {
01355             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01356             std::string temp;
01357             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01358             {
01359                 // The text value does not exist - set value to the default
01360                 *value = defaultValue;
01361                 return;
01362             }
01363 
01364             // Stream the value from the string to T
01365             FromString( temp, value );
01366         }
01367 
01383         template< class T >
01384             void GetText( T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true )
01385         {
01386             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01387             std::string temp;
01388             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01389             {
01390                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01391                 {
01392                     THROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01393                 }
01394                 else
01395                 {
01396                     return;
01397                 }
01398             }
01399 
01400             // Stream the value from the string to T
01401             FromString( temp, value );
01402         }
01403 
01411         template < class T >
01412             void SetText( const T& value )
01413         {
01414             ValidatePointer();
01415             std::string temp = ToString( value );
01416 
01417             if ( m_tiXmlPointer->NoChildren() )
01418             {
01419                 m_tiXmlPointer->LinkEndChild( new TiXmlText( temp ) );
01420             }
01421             else
01422             {
01423                 if ( NULL == m_tiXmlPointer->GetText() )
01424                 {
01425                     m_tiXmlPointer->InsertBeforeChild( m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild(), TiXmlText( temp ) );
01426                 }
01427                 else
01428                 {
01429                     // There already is text, so change it
01430                     m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild()->SetValue( temp );
01431                 }
01432             }
01433         }
01434 
01446         template < class T, class DefaulT >
01447             void GetAttributeOrDefault( const std::string& name, T* value, const DefaulT& defaultValue )
01448         {
01449             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01450             std::string temp;
01451             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01452             {
01453                 // The attribute does not exist - set value to the default
01454                 *value = defaultValue;
01455                 return;
01456             }
01457 
01458             // Stream the value from the string to T
01459             FromString( temp, value );
01460         }
01461 
01473         template< class T >
01474             void GetAttribute( const std::string& name, T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true )
01475         {
01476             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01477             std::string temp;
01478             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01479             {
01480                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01481                 {
01482                     THROW( "Attribute does not exist" );
01483                 }
01484                 else
01485                 {
01486                     return;
01487                 }
01488             }
01489 
01490             // Stream the value from the string to T
01491             FromString( temp, value );
01492         }
01493 
01494     private:
01495 
01500         bool GetAttributeImp( const std::string& name, std::string* value );
01501 
01506         bool GetTextImp( std::string* value );
01507     };
